sn12.3:1.2: “Mendicants, I will teach you the wrong practice and the right practice.
sn12.3:1.3: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak.”
sn12.3:2.2: Ignorance is a condition for choices.
sn12.3:2.3: Choices are a condition for consciousness. …
sn12.3:2.4: That is how this entire mass of suffering originates.
sn12.3:2.5: This is called the wrong practice.
sn12.3:3.2: When ignorance fades away and ceases with nothing left over, choices cease.
sn12.3:3.4: That is how this entire mass of suffering ceases.
sn12.3:3.5: This is called the right practice.”
